properties.entry: SELECT MS.* FROM MESSAGE MS JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_ID =MS.MESSAGE_RECEIVER) WHERE USER_ID = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT MESSAGE_NO , MESSAGE_TITLE , MESSAGE_RECEIVER , MESSAGE_RECEPIENT , MESSAGE_RECEIVE_TIME FROM MESSAGE M JOIN MEMBER ON (MESSAGE_RECEIVER=USER_ID) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_ID=? ORDER BY MESSAGE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM MESSAGE WHERE MESSAGE_RECEIVER=? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO MESSAGE ( MESSAGE_NO , MESSAGE_TITLE , MESSAGE_CONTENT , MESSAGE_RECEIVER , MESSAGE_RECEPIENT , MESSAGE_RECEIVE_TIME ) VALUES ( SEQ_MESSAGE.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE )
SELECT MS.* FROM MESSAGE MS JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_ID =MS.MESSAGE_RECEIVER) WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT MESSAGE_NO , MESSAGE_TITLE , MESSAGE_RECEIVER , MESSAGE_RECEPIENT , MESSAGE_CONTENT , MESSAGE_RECEIVE_TIME FROM MESSAGE M WHERE MESSAGE_NO = ? AND M.STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MESSAGE SET MESSAGE_READ= 'Y' WHERE MESSAGE_NO=?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT MESSAGE_NO , MESSAGE_TITLE , MESSAGE_RECEIVER , MESSAGE_RECEPIENT , MESSAGE_RECEIVE_TIME FROM MESSAGE M JOIN MEMBER ON (MESSAGE_RECEIVER=USER_ID) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND MESSAGE_READ= 'N' AND USER_ID=? ORDER BY MESSAGE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM MESSAGE WHERE MESSAGE_RECEIVER=? AND STATUS = 'Y' AND MESSAGE_READ = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM MESSAGE WHERE MESSAGE_RECEIVER=? AND MESSAGE_RECEPIENT='admin' AND MESSAGE_ADMIN='Y' AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT MESSAGE_NO , MESSAGE_TITLE , MESSAGE_RECEIVER , MESSAGE_RECEPIENT , MESSAGE_RECEIVE_TIME FROM MESSAGE M JOIN MEMBER ON (MESSAGE_RECEIVER=USER_ID) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND MESSAGE_ADMIN='Y' AND MESSAGE_RECEPIENT='admin' AND USER_ID=? ORDER BY MESSAGE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
